author: Robert Edgijex
title: Fall the Worm
introduction: Seventeen years ago, a letter shattered David’s soul, corrupting his magical “Pure Flame” into a “Hollow Flame”—a self-devouring fire fueled by the pain of a love he could never forget . He became a broken paladin, a haunted man walking the ruins of a world fractured by a malevolent sorceress named Xenja
author_comment: Thank you so much for guiding me with patience and insight. I couldn't ask for a better collaborator!
